post:
Found this offer from WHT and bought one. Wanted to share it at LET.

XEN PV/HVM with 512 MB Ram, 20 GB Disc and 1 TB Bandwidth at $5.98 / month. Servers are located in Germany. Offer link -
[WHT Offer Link](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1142100)

Initially I was allocated a XEN PV server which I requested to move to XEN HVM. Currently I'm on XEN HVM vps.

Some benchmark-

root@qhoster:~# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync
16384+0 records in
16384+0 records out
1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 5.98389 s, 179 MB/s

root@qhoster:~# wget http://cachefly.cachefly.net/100mb.test
--2012-04-05 15:59:46--  http://cachefly.cachefly.net/100mb.test
Resolving cachefly.cachefly.net... 205.234.175.175
Connecting to cachefly.cachefly.net|205.234.175.175|:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK
Length: 104857600 (100M) [application/octet-stream]
Saving to: `100mb.test.1'

100%[================================>] 10,48,57,600 12.7M/s   in 7.7s

2012-04-05 15:59:54 (12.9 MB/s) - `100mb.test.1' saved [104857600/104857600]

Hope fellow LET people will find it useful.


Disclaimer: I am only a client of QHoster. I have no other commercial association with them.
